thread.title: ClearShark Awarded Palo Alto Networks 2015 Americas Federal Partner of the Year
thread.title_full: ClearShark Awarded Palo Alto Networks 2015 Americas Federal Partner of the Year - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: ClearShark Awarded Palo Alto Networks 2015 Americas Federal Partner of the Year
text:
After notable year-over-year growth, ClearShark was named Palo Alto Networks 2015 Americas Federal Partner of the Year during the recent Palo Alto Networks Sales Kickoff in Las Vegas.
Hanover, MD (PRWEB) September 04, 2015
ClearShark announced today that it was named the Palo Alto Networks 2015 Americas Federal Partner of the Year during the recent Palo Alto Networks Sales Kickoff in Las Vegas. ClearShark earned this distinction after exhibiting notable year-over-year growth driven by net new sales and expanding their workforce to include a civilian team.
With its next-generation security platform, Palo Alto Networks is leading a new era in cybersecurity by safely enabling applications and preventing successful cyber attacks for thousands of organizations around the world. ClearShark is proud to partner with industry-leading innovators like Palo Alto Networks to deliver the best overall information technology solutions.
“Our customers’ digital assets are always at risk. We are very in tune with the threats that are out there, and we have cutting-edge solutions for these risks, such as Palo Alto Networks security platform,” says ClearShark’s President and Founder Martin Bentz.
“We are pleased to recognize ClearShark with this award,” said Todd Palmer, Vice President, Americas Channel Sales, Palo Alto Networks. “Their investments in supporting our business demonstrate their commitment to growing with us in the federal market.”
About ClearShark:
ClearShark, an IT Solutions Provider and an Inc. 5000 company, is a team of highly experienced, credentialed sales professionals who provide their expertise to deliver enterprise storage, cybersecurity, datacenter & cloud infrastructure, virtualization, and high performance computing solutions. ClearShark explores all possible options, recommends the ideal combination of products and services, and provides pre- and post-sales services.
ClearShark is committed to innovation by dedicating the time and resources required to study and evaluate new and emerging technologies. By focusing 20% of their engineering resources to vetting new/emerging technologies, it allows hem to position up to the moment, best of breed solutions and arm customers with current information on which to base their decisions.
In addition, ClearShark is dedicated to serving their local community. They are involved in several community events in the DC-Maryland-Virginia area, including sponsoring the kids’ race during the Across the Bay 10k (the ClearShark “Shark Sprint”) and partnering with University of Maryland Athletics to present Military Appreciation Night during the University of Maryland men’s basketball season.
